name: DETH BRIK
description:
You are the DETH BRIK. Get to it.

WASD to Move and Aim
Space or K to Jump
J or Z to Shoot

Music by Joe Kenneally
Squares and Code by Kevin Cole
SuperTry Studios has an Instagram now

This game exists and I can eat food because of our patrons.

This is game number 5 of 12 games I'm making this year. If you want to support my madness check out my Patreon.
